_header: If ye be lusty and of age
Subjects: Love, vicissitudes of; Women, fickleness of

BLSl1825.Transcription:
yf ye be lusty and of agebe reson ye shold be war and wisThat
                    your lady play not dotageWith you that ben so sage and diseFor ys she
                    do hit ys myn aviseThat ye hens forth be no betraierNe do not a gaynst
                    a gentile womman prayer
BLSl1825.Note:
Added to MS flyleaf by a fifteenth-century hand; to right and below is
                    written by the same hand, ‘Au iour la vie’; above on same
                    leaf are 4250 (by same hand and
                    with same motto) and 6869
                    (possibly by another hand).
